item.title: Eliana's Dissent: A Snippet
item.description:
Project Indigo: Faith’s Call
1. Eliana’s Dissent
Version last modified 29 December 2020

Eliana woke to the weighted chains. She rolled onto her side, back to the wall, and propped herself up. The jailer jingled up and down the corridor. Eliana yawned and as she closed her eyes, she reached out and felt for them â€” nothing. A shame. The door rocked under heavy knocking. Eliana stood up. The dress of a Cardinal was unmistakable. As he entered with the imperium of the Faith, the smell of myrrh filled the air. The jailer kissed his signet ring. His attendants recited scripture as they followed.
